name: rightui-core
description: A collection of unstyled and keyboard friendly UI components for your React App.

scripts.publish-switch: yarn build-switch && yarn workspace @rightui/switch npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-treeview: yarn build-treeview && yarn workspace @rightui/treeview npm publish --access public
scripts.publish-all: yarn workspace @rightui/switch npm publish --access public && yarn workspace @rightui/treeview npm publish --access public
